alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Prince George; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:00PM EDT until July 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Prince George County in south central Virginia... North central Sussex County in southeastern Virginia... East central Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Petersburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carson around 510 PM EDT. Disputanta around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Newville, Richard Bland College, Burgess, Templeton, Booker, Reams and Prince George Golf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
